name: Alone With It
description:
Alone With It is a first person, horror game built in 1 week for the 2021 Epic MegaJam under the Theme of [Running out of space] which is mostly seen in the game's inventory mechanic.

Story:
You were exploring the void in your space ship when you and your crew hit something you shouldn't have. Now you're alone with It and you need to escape.

- Simple Gameplay (explore the ship, gather items to help you survive the monster and escape the ship)
- A short prototype, playtime of 10 minutes

Third Party Assets
- SFX from WeLoveIndies
- Music from FesliyanStudios Background Music
- Ambience from Ambience Lab
- Level + Object Assets from Polar Sci-Fi Facility by Julio Juarez. 
- Spaceship Interior Environment Set by Denys Rutkovskyi.
- Modular SciFi Season 1+2 Starter Bundle by Jonathon Frederick
- Character + Animations from Mixamo
- UI from SCI-FI UI Pack Pro by D.F.Y. STUDIO
